thread.section_title: Hotel Joke - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great value for money
thread.title_full: Great value for money - Review of Hotel Joke - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: regevitzhaki
title: Great value for money
text:
We stayed their for 3 nights. The hotel is in a good location - 5 minutes walk from the metro station. The rooms are very clean and unique. The breakfast was good with eggs , yogurt, fruit, cheese and more. The staff was really great, kind and helpful. They provide free drinks to go every day and even provided us with fruits on our back home.
Really recomended.
